name: Conways Game of Life
text: Coursework for C4071068 my Advanced Programming module at Newcastle. This project was my first full introduction to C++. The code displays a user interface that simulates Conway's game of life. Alongside this the user may search for specific patterns that can form in the game/ Including: spaceships, Oscillators, Blinkers,and toads. Core features: Threading, parallel programming, Pattern Detection, Templates, Operator overrides, Classes, Inheritance et al. Final Grade: 100/100. https://github.com/Alasdair-PB/ConwaysGameOfLife-C4071068/tree/master
